page.title: 05TRAFFIC SURVEYS: Near Lepton
page.content: We carried out two surveys in or near Lepton. The first took place on Wednesday 10th July, ll.5O - l2.O5 on the A629 road between Huddersfield and Sheffield. The second census was carried out on Thursday 11th July, l4.35- l4.5O in Highgate Lane, Lepton. These are the survey figures: {l.A629 survey. }TO H TO S TOTAL LORRIES 5 14 19 SMALL VANS 16 10 26 CARS 86 130 216 LARGE VANS 9 9 18 BICYCLES ETC. 1 4 5 BUSES 2 0 2 OTHER 0 2 2 TOTAL 119 169 288 If we multiply the figures by four, we obtain a rough estimate of the number of vehicles per hour. There would be a total of 1152 vehicles per hour.
